caption.center: Spencer CLINCY v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal No. C-182 from Judgment dated Sept. 14, 1988; James D. Bell, Ruling Judge, Hinds County Circuit Court, First Judicial District.
opinion.attorneys:
V.T. Vallas, Jackson, for appellant.
Mike C. Moore, Atty. Gen., Billy L. Gore, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before HAWKINS, P.J., and ROBERTSON and SULLIVAN, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
ROY NOBLE LEE, C.J., DAN M. LEE, P.J., and PRATHER, ANDERSON, PITTMAN and BLASS, JJ., concur.
